QuestData.Title: Outside Influence
QuestData.Description:
It takes a particular kind of magic to pilot a necropolis. The Eyes' helmsman perished with Nurakkir.
But Baroness Vashj has informed me of a means to acquire a new helmsman.
Follow me to our house's communications beacon. My baroness has taught me a way to summon just the individual we require.
I suspect she will not be pleased at the prospect of serving us. I trust you will encourage her compliance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Khaliiq at the House of Eyes' communications pillar.
